text: Mark Meseroll (July 22, 1955 – November 17, 2018) was an American football tackle. He played for the New Orleans Saints in 1978. He died on November 17, 2018, in Salisbury, North Carolina at age 63. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American football tackles Category:Wesley Wolverines football players Category:Florida State Seminoles football players Category:New Orleans Saints players
title: Mark Meseroll
